Method Detail

createShapeLayer

public static com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.FLyrVect createShapeLayer(com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.MapContext mapContext,
                                                                       java.io.File path,
                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                       int geometryType,
                                                                       org.cresques.cts.IProjection projection,
                                                                       com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.FieldDescription[] fieldsDesc)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception

Creates a new shape layer in mapContext with the specified name, at path.

Parameters:
mapContext - MapControl's MapContext where create the layer.
path - the path where create the shape layer files (included the file name and main shape extension).
name - the name of the new layer.
geometryType - type of geometries for the new layer. (See FShape).
projection - the projection of the new layer.
fieldsDesc - properties of the fields of the new layer.
Returns:
the new layer created, or null if has happened any problem
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if fails creating the layer

getShapeLayer

public static com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.FLyrVect getShapeLayer(java.io.File path,
                                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                                    org.cresques.cts.IProjection projection)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception

Gets a shape layer in mapContext with the specified name, at path.

Parameters:
path - the path where the shape layer files are.
name - the name of the layer, if null will have the file name.
projection - the projection of the layer.
Returns:
the new layer created, or null if has happened any problem
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if fails getting the layer
See Also:
LayerFactory.createLayer(String, VectorialFileDriver, File, IProjection)
